name: Githzerai Monk
proficiencies: Saving Throw: STR +3 | Saving Throw: DEX +4, INT +3, WIS +4 | Skill: Insight +4 | Skill: Perception +4

special_abilities.name: Innate Spellcasting (Psionics).
special_abilities.desc: The githzeraiâ€™s innate spellcasting ability is Wisdom. It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no components:

special_abilities.name: Psychic Defense.
special_abilities.desc: While the githzerai is wearing no armor and wielding no shield, its AC includes its Wisdom modifier.

actions.name: Multiattack.
actions.desc: The githzerai makes two unarmed strikes.

actions.name: Unarmed Strike.
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d8 + 2) bludgeoning damage plus 9 (2d8) psychic damage. This is a magic weapon attack.
